brandIntro.title: Born from gratitude
brandIntro.text: Kapunka means “thank you.” We make pure argan care with clinical respect—simple routines that comfort skin and support healing. Our oil is cooperatively sourced in Morocco and clarified without solvents.

founderMini.title: Meet Founder Kenza Khouchach
founderMini.body: Kenza grew up between Casablanca and Paris, sourcing argan oil directly from her family’s network of cooperatives. She created Kapunka to give clinics traceable, patient-safe rituals rooted in Moroccan wellbeing.

newsletterPitch: Get monthly updates on clinic protocols, ingredient sourcing, and new product drops tailored for sensitive skin pros.
